description: Short-stay Schengen Tourist visa for Austria (Type C). Standard application route for Indian applicants via VFS Global (Austria).

meta.processing_time_standard: 15 Calendar Days (may vary; apply 4-6 weeks before travel)
meta.passport_validity: Minimum 3 months beyond intended departure from Schengen
meta.photo_spec: 35x45mm, ICAO Standard, white background, not older than 6 months
meta.min_funds_requirement: Recommended ~€100/day or equivalent bank balance; if staying with host, an EVE (Electronic Declaration of Commitment) can substitute detailed proof of personal funds.

documents.title: Original Passport
documents.description: Passport valid for at least 3 months after planned departure from Schengen, issued within last 10 years, with at least 2 blank pages. Provide photocopies of identity pages and previous Schengen/US/UK visas if any.

documents.title: Schengen Application Form
documents.description: Completed and signed Schengen visa application form (C). Can be filled online via VFS and printed or filled by hand in black/blue ink as instructed.

documents.title: Passport-size Photos
documents.description: Two recent photos 35x45mm, white background, ICAO compliant, neutral expression.

documents.title: Travel Medical Insurance
documents.description: Medical/travel insurance with minimum coverage of €30,000 valid for the entire Schengen area and for the full duration of stay.

documents.title: Round Trip Flight Reservation
documents.description: Confirmed return or onward flight reservation showing entry to and exit from Austria/Schengen (dummy reservation acceptable in many cases).

documents.title: Proof of Accommodation
documents.description: Hotel booking confirmation for the entire stay or address & proof of host if staying with family/friends.

documents.title: Proof of Sufficient Funds
documents.description: Bank statements for last 3 months (stamped if available), salary slips, ITR copies, or other proof of means to cover stay. For sponsored stays, EVE is primary proof.

documents.title: Employment Proof / NOC
documents.description: Employment letter stating leave sanction and designation; for students, a bonafide letter from institute; for self-employed, business registration/GST documents.

documents.title: Cover Letter / Itinerary
documents.description: Brief personal cover letter describing purpose of travel, planned dates, itinerary and funding sources.

documents.title: Electronic Declaration of Commitment (EVE)
documents.description: If staying with a host in Austria, the host must obtain an EVE (Elektronische Verpflichtungserklärung) from the relevant Austrian authority (Aliens Police). You only need to provide the host's 8-digit EVE ID during application.

steps_flow.title: Fill Application Form
steps_flow.description: Complete the Schengen Visa application form for Austria. Use the VFS online form or download, fill and print as instructed.

steps_flow.title: Book Appointment (VFS Global)
steps_flow.description: Create an account on the VFS Austria portal for India and book a Short Stay Visa appointment at your nearest VFS Global centre (Delhi, Mumbai, Chennai, Kolkata, Bengaluru, Hyderabad). Pay any required service fee during booking.

steps_flow.title: Gather Documents & Prepare Originals
steps_flow.description: Collect all required originals and photocopies: passport, photos, insurance, flight reservation, accommodation, bank statements, employment/study proof, cover letter and EVE ID if applicable. Put them in the order specified by VFS checklist.

steps_flow.title: Submit Application & Biometrics
steps_flow.description: Attend your VFS appointment in person. Submit documents, pay the consular fee (90 EUR) and VFS service charge, and provide biometric data (fingerprints & photo) if required. Keep the VFS receipt for tracking.

steps_flow.title: Track Application & Await Decision
steps_flow.description: Track application status on the VFS portal using your receipt number. Standard processing takes up to 15 calendar days; delays possible during peak season or additional checks.

steps_flow.title: Collect Passport / Visa
steps_flow.description: Once processed, collect your passport from the VFS centre or receive it by courier if you opted for delivery. Inspect the visa sticker for correct dates and details before travel.
